titleStmt.title: A second sermon, preached at Paules Crosse, the 21. of May, 1598. vpon the 21. of Math. the 12. and 13. verses concluding a former sermon preached the 4. of December 1597. vpon the same text. By Iohn Hovvson, student of Christes-Church in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Howson, John, 1557?-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Arn. Hatfield for Thomas Adams, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the white Lion,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
